subject: Horse Racing
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Preakness Stakes
Belmont Stakes
Horses
lead_paragraph: A subdued Richard Dutrow Jr. said the Preakness, the second leg of the Triple Crown, could give his horse trouble because it came just two weeks after the Derby.
snippet: A subdued Richard Dutrow Jr. said the Preakness, the second leg of the Triple Crown, could give his horse trouble because it came just two weeks after the Derby.
